channel.title: Please help :) rep++
channel.description:
guys, when i try to add walking npc's to my cleaned server i get this error after added it in autospan.cfg
[code]RuneScape - By Nox Initiating Start Methods. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "R ock Crab" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at org.entity.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2262) at org.entity.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at org.Server.main(Server.java:129) [/code]
This is what i add in autospawn:
[code]// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description spawn = 1265 2686 3715 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2686 3722 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2686 3728 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2686 3728 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2684 3731 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2681 3731 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2677 3728 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2674 3731 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab spawn = 1265 2671 3730 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab [ENDOFSPAWNLIST][/code]
What i do fail? ill rep++ u if u can help me :) [table][tr] [td][/td] [/tr] [/table]

RuneScape - By Nox Initiating Start Methods. item.title: Please help :) rep++
item.dc:creator: @Broke Broke
item.description:
@Broke wrote:

You made mistake with spaces I think. You used “normal” space just replace with this space: " "
I made this work with you.

Copy This so it will Work.

// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description
spawn = 1265 2686 3715 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2686 3722 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2686 3728 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2686 3728 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2684 3731 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2681 3731 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2677 3728 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2674 3731 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
spawn = 1265 2671 3730 0 1 1 10 10 Rock Crab
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

Try earse one of my spaces so you can see the point.

Read full topic
